original_text: Then the Lord said to me, “Out of the north disaster shall be let loose upon all the inhabitants of the land.
korean_text: 여호와께서 내게 이르시되 재앙이 북방에서 일어나 이 땅의 모든 주민들에게 부어지리라

sentences.original_text: Then the Lord said to me,
Out of the north disaster shall be let loose
upon all the inhabitants of the land.
